title: CES 2022: Tech Show Faces Dilemma as Covid Cases Rise and Companies Stay Home
sub_head: Giant tech show is set for first week of January, with vaccine and mask requirements. Yet as Omicron surges, some participants are withdrawing.
body:
Organizers of CES 2022 are pressing ahead with plans to host tens of thousands of people in Las Vegas next month, setting up the technology conference as a test for mass business gatherings at a time when surging Covid-19 cases are prompting other companies and groups to change plans.
Several participants including Amazon.com Inc., Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc. and Twitter Inc., and at least one keynote speaker, T-Mobile â€™s chief executive, have withdrawn from the event.
